feed.title: Immich-Frame Releases

entry.title: New release for Immich-Frame: v1.0.7.0
entry.content:
What's Changed

ðŸš€ Other changes

  • Replace FluentAvalonia theme with Avalonia's Fluent theme. Fixes context menu issue by @3rob3 in https://github.com/3rob3/ImmichFrame/pull/97

Full Changelog: https://github.com/3rob3/ImmichFrame/compare/v1.0.6.0...v1.0.7.0

entry.title: New release for Immich-Frame: v1.0.8.0
entry.content:
What's Changed

âœ¨ New Features

  • Add current weather image next to temperature by @3rob3 in https://github.com/3rob3/ImmichFrame/pull/108
  • Add image stretch options Closes #103 by @3rob3 in https://github.com/3rob3/ImmichFrame/pull/110
  • Refactor MainView code to MainViewModel, make async where possible by @3rob3 in https://github.com/3rob3/ImmichFrame/pull/113
  • feat: Exclude albums option & exclude videos by @JW-CH in https://github.com/3rob3/ImmichFrame/pull/111
  • feat: Adding UnattendedMode setting to enable auto-continue on ErrorView. by @ScottFries in https://github.com/3rob3/ImmichFrame/pull/112
    • Highlight required settings with red border (if blank). - Avalonia update by @3rob3 in https://github.com/3rob3/ImmichFrame/pull/115
  • Better Android Background and Screensaver handing by @3rob3 in https://github.com/3rob3/ImmichFrame/pull/117
  • State display & ISO 3166 Abbreviations by @ScottFries in https://github.com/3rob3/ImmichFrame/pull/114
  • Add Settings screen expanders and organize settings under them by @3rob3 in https://github.com/3rob3/ImmichFrame/pull/118
  • Show settings page instead of error message when settings not found. by @3rob3 in https://github.com/3rob3/ImmichFrame/pull/119

âš¡ Fixes

  • Reverting version of Microsoft.Extensions.ApiDescription.Client and NSwag.ApiDescription.Client packages. by @ScottFries in https://github.com/3rob3/ImmichFrame/pull/101

ðŸ““ Documentation

  • Add note about UID from URL to README.md by @NicholasFlamy in https://github.com/3rob3/ImmichFrame/pull/106

New Contributors

  • @ScottFries made their first contribution in https://github.com/3rob3/ImmichFrame/pull/101
  • @NicholasFlamy made their first contribution in https://github.com/3rob3/ImmichFrame/pull/106

Full Changelog: https://github.com/3rob3/ImmichFrame/compare/v1.0.7.0...v1.0.8.0

entry.title: New release for Immich-Frame: v1.0.9.0
entry.content:
What's Changed

âœ¨ New Features

  • Nicer weather icons loaded from assets instead of http requests by @3rob3 in https://github.com/3rob3/ImmichFrame/pull/122
  • Welcome page by @JW-CH in https://github.com/3rob3/ImmichFrame/pull/107
  • Add configurable refresh interval for Albums and People. Closes #123 by @3rob3 in https://github.com/3rob3/ImmichFrame/pull/124

ðŸ”¨ Maintenance

  • Directly use Settings.CurrentSettings by @3rob3 in https://github.com/3rob3/ImmichFrame/pull/121

Full Changelog: https://github.com/3rob3/ImmichFrame/compare/v1.0.8.0...v1.0.9.0
